original_text: Then Jesus went through the towns and villages, teaching as he made his way to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 예수께서 각 성 각 마을로 다니사 가르치시며 예루살렘으로 여행하시더니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus went through towns and villages
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 여러 도시와 마을을 지나가셨습니다

sentences.original_text: teaching as he made his way to Jerusalem
